essay: I am not a patience person, like I can’t sit in a sit for more than five minutes, but there was one time I was patience and i bet very alse was to that right riding a bike where out training wheels. When I was five learned how to ride a bike I just keeped falling of at one piont my bike  flip and I allmost broke my jaw but i didn’t. Finally after @NUM1 weeks of onstint falling I rode for @NUM2 minutes without falling and finally learn how to riken a bike.
Comments_gemini:
:**

The student's essay needs significant improvement in all areas. The student should focus on developing their ideas more thoroughly, organizing their essay more logically, and improving their command of language and conventions of Standard English.

**Highlighted Errors:**

* "I am not a patience person" should be "I am not a patient person."
* "like I can’t sit in a sit for more than five minutes" should be "like I can't sit in one place for more than five minutes."
* "but there was one time I was patience" should be "but there was one time I was patient."
* "and i bet very alse was to that right riding a bike where out training wheels" should be "and I bet very few people were as proud of me as I was when I learned how to ride a bike without training wheels."
* "When I was five learned how to ride a bike I just keeped falling of at one piont my bike flip and I allmost broke my jaw but i didn’t" should be "When I was five, I learned how to ride a bike. I kept falling off. At one point, my bike flipped over and I almost broke my jaw, but I didn't."
* "Finally after @NUM1 weeks of onstint falling I rode for @NUM2 minutes without falling and finally learn how to riken a bike" should be "Finally, after weeks of constant falling, I rode for minutes without falling and finally learned how to ride a bike."
